39071936.review: In all of my life, I have come across good games. I have come across great games. I have come across amazing games that have changed my life. But nothing, NOTHING could of prepared me for this game. First, lets start with the sound design. Have you ever heard angels sing? No? Wll play this game and now you have. And make sure to have your volume all the way up. And the graphics OH the graphics. They honestly make games like Uncharted 4 and Breath of the Wild look as primitive as Space Invaders. But above all is the gameplay. I could spend days, weeks, months even playing this game and never get bored because the gameplay is simply too compelling to not. 38953429.review:
[h1]マルチでたのしい。何故だかたのしい。
でも10分で飽きるよ。でもでもそのうちまた少しやりたくなるよ。[/h1]
　
完成度から言えばうんちです。セールじゃないと400円？ちょっと勿体無い。
このゲームは見ての通り、動物が車に乗ってアイテムをぶつけ合ってコースを3周して順位を争うゲームだ。
でも説明文には「ゴーカートシミュレーション」。そう、レースゲーとは言っていない。
それでもおすすめを押した理由を書きます。
　
このゲームは一般的なレースゲームと違ってキャラによる個体差が無かったり、
バックは一旦レバーを下にさげてから左右で方向転換しないといけなかったり、
ジャンプやアイテムは何故かマウスを動かし画面の左右の水色ボタンをクリックすると発動される。
　
さらにどこかに1ミリでも引っかかると速度が0になるのでバックしないといけない。
なので一度引っかかったら大幅な遅れを取るのでアイテムを駆使する必要がある。
その肝心のアイテムを見ていこう。ちなみにコンピュータはアイテムを使わない。
まずハンマーとトゲトゲ。左右に小範囲の攻撃。何も面白くない。
続いて風船(?)はおそらくハズレ。自分が減速する。早くアイテムボタンを押して消費しよう。
そしてミサイル。まっすぐ飛んでいくミサイルを撃つ。
最後にバナナ。踏むと滑る。それだけ。それだけなのだが…
　
[h1]アイテムは時間経過で消えるまでボタンを押すほど発動できる。[/h1]
このシステムがアイテムのバランスを狂わせる。
アイテムを食らうとカートがスピンするだけでなく、画面もグルグル。
ミサイルは混戦中は強力だ。だが何よりバナナが強すぎて仕方がないのだ。
　
[h1]ｷｲｨｨｨｲｲｲｲｲ!!!!!!wwｷｲｨｨｨｲｲｲｲｲ!!!!!!wwww[/h1]
押した分だけコースがバナナだらけになり誰かが踏むまで消えない。
対人だとこれのせいで酔える。前を走ってる方がバナナ連打。
後続がそれを踏む。ｷｨｲｲｲ!!!!!という音と共にスピン。スピンが終わる。
アクセルの仕様上止まれないのですかさず目の前のバナナを踏む。ｷｨｲｲｲ!!!!!
独走中の犯人が半周差をつける。犯人、自分が置いたバナナを踏む。ｷｨｲｲｲｲ!!!!!!!
…笑うしかない。(おすすめ行き決定の瞬間)
　
[h1]オマケ要素もあるよ。[/h1]
レースに勝つとポイントが増え、一定のポイントを溜めるとCG動画がアンロックされる。
これがマジで何を言いたいのか分からない。笑うしかない。
　
[h1]その他[/h1]
・日本語対応
全ての英語のテキストがグーグルか何かの翻訳で日本語化されている。
それのせいでお粗末な翻訳が多い。タイトルも「野生動物のレース」とある。
・ライオンが…
ミニマップ上のアイコンはオスなのにどう見てもメス。
・表彰台
2位や3位より4位の方が高さ的に良さそう。
　
色々笑うしかない。笑えるのでセール時に仲の良いお友達とやる分にはおすすめです。
このゲームが次世代eスポーツになる事を願います。誰か大会開いて下さい出ますので。

38922595.review:
Wild Animal Racing. К этой игре возникают вопросы уже с названия, но с каждой минутой игры вопросы собираются в огромный вопросный ком, готовый раздавить нерадивого игрока, посмевшего залезть туда, куда ему лезть не следовало.

Достаточно прочитать описание, чтобы понять одну простую вещь: заурядных гоночек можно не ждать. Переведённая на украинский секция рецензий и невероятно некачественный машинный перевод – это только начало. Готовьтесь выбирать драйвер в Диких Животных Гоночных, ребятки! Разработчик и реакция сообщества на его продукт также потрясают. Просто посмотрите на количество положительных отзывов. И это вы ещё фан-группу не видели!

Игровой процесс следует основам привычных аркадных гонок на картах, вроде того же Mario Kart, однако и не забывает удивить игрока уникальными особенностями. Начнём с самого важного: враги быстрее персонажа, которым управляет игрок. Ага, они в любом случае обгонят его, толкнут и оставят его машинку застрявшей в текстурах. Игрок может собирать восьмигранники, незначительно увеличивающие его максимальную скорость, но это мало чем поможет. Бонусов же всего пять, один из которых ещё и не работает, причём они не одноразовые, как это обычно бывает, а действуют какое-то время после их подбора. То есть вам ничего не мешает закидать всю трассу банановой кожурой и самому же от них и страдать на следующем круге. Трассы тут тоже хороши: если вызывающую эпилептические припадки гонку ещё можно выиграть, то как вам последний кубок, действие которого происходит на бездорожье? Примечательно оно тем, что все участники гонки благополучно застревают в текстурах уже на старте, а игрок должен умудриться освободиться, чтобы потом ПРЫЖКАМИ добраться до финиша, попутно стараясь не застрять в текстурах окончательно. Настоящее бездорожье.

За победы и упомянутые выше восьмигранники игрок получает очки, которые отрывают шедевральные мультфильмы, пародирующие Космическую Одиссею 2001 или даже Побег из Шоушенка. Почему? Почему здесь есть управление мышкой? Почему эта игра стала такой популярной? Почему скоро выйдет сиквел? Впрочем, задать следует лишь один вопрос: почему эта игра вообще существует?

P.S.

38826265.review: 在我為這款遊戲作出評論之前，我想先感謝遊戲的作者Paul Bird 和其他創作者，謝謝你們創作了一款如此美妙的遊戲----野生動物賽車，這款遊戲在我人生最低沉，最痛苦，最無助的時候為我帶來一絲光明，因為它 我有了生存下去的希望與勇氣 我明白到世界上還有許多像野生動物賽車一樣美妙的事物等待著我去發掘，他令我打消了輕生的念頭 也讓我開始真正的思考自己的人生，每一次當我打開這款遊戲，聽到背景音樂 都令我不禁陷入反思 我到底為了什麼而活，我又如何可以讓自己活得更美好 更精彩？甚至，能為這世界做出貢獻把歡樂帶給別人？於是，我把這款神作獻給了最好的朋友，然而，此舉卻令我失去了我唯一的好朋友。我的人生再次陷入低潮，但是，這一次又野生動物賽車在我身邊守護 陪伴著我，我明白到自己再也不會孤單一人 於是太陽又再次在我的人生中升起。感謝你 野生動物賽車，你是我最好的朋友 是我的家人 是我的愛人，自從有你之後，我再不會放棄了 因為我知道我有你這個最堅硬的後盾在支持著我，我相信 我知道你今後也會守護著我們這些孤單的，不是嗎？

37364220.review:
相当轻松愉快却又不乏紧张刺激的一款赛车游戏，非常推荐！
虽然看这游戏的评论区似乎和七大名著类似，但这款游戏除了禅意之外确实带给我了很多乐趣。

可能很多人刚玩这个游戏会被它的画风和入门难度吓退，但实际上一旦接受了这个设定就会觉得画风还是挺可爱的hhh，而且掌握了窍门之后会发现也不是那么难，更是能从中享受到与AI斗智斗勇的乐趣。

说一下这个游戏的一些窍门吧：
1、首先强烈建议使用手柄，手柄的操作体验相当不错。
2、AI的移速比人类玩家快，但不会使用道具也不会抄近道，所以人类玩家想要取胜基本只能靠抄近道和使用道具。
3、道具只有时间限制没有使用次数限制，拣到道具就不停的用就行。
4、香蕉皮是终极神器，如果能在前两圈捡到两个香蕉皮基本稳第一。捡到香蕉皮之后在道路中央疯狂放香蕉皮，A通常I会在那里卡很久。
5、人类玩家的倒车体验非常差，所以尽量不要被卡到需要倒车的地方。
6、尽量不要与AI近距离接触，在没有道具的情况下吃亏的只会是人类玩家。
7、最好的driver是斑马和长颈鹿，他们的起始站位最前。
8、对人类玩家最友好的锦标赛是“神奇”，因为前两图可以靠抄近道轻松第一，第三图道路很窄香蕉皮效果相当显著。


全成就非常轻松，简单说下攻略：
1、点击游戏开始界面长颈鹿的眼睛可以解锁彩蛋成就。
2、最难的锦标赛是“团结”，由于道路很宽且很少近道，对人类玩家不友好。但第二图终点处有一近道在不落后AI太多的情况下甚至可以从第六翻到第一，剩下两图保证前三即可夺冠。
3、最少人获得的成就居然是和朋友分别拿到第一第二，emmm……

不过有一句说一句，玩这游戏需要非常好的心态。希望各位朋友都能在与AI的肉搏和倒车中静静体会这款游戏的禅意。

36653939.review: Whenever I get a package of plain M&Ms, I make it my duty to continue the strength and robustness of the candy as a species. To this end, I hold M&M duels. Taking two candies between my thumb and forefinger, I apply pressure, squeezing them together until one of them cracks and splinters. That is the “loser,” and I eat the inferior one immediately. The winner gets to go another round. I have found that, in general, the brown and red M&Ms are tougher, and the newer blue ones are genetically inferior. I have hypothesized that the blue M&Ms as a race cannot survive long in the intense theater of competition that is the modern candy and snack-food world. Occasionally I will get a mutation, a candy that is misshapen, or pointier, or flatter than the rest. Almost invariably this proves to be a weakness, but on very rare occasions it gives the candy extra strength. In this way, the species continues to adapt to its environment. When I reach the end of the pack, I am left with one M&M, the strongest of the herd. Since it would make no sense to eat this one as well, I pack it neatly in an envelope and send it to M&M Mars, A Division of Mars, Inc., Hackettstown, NJ 17840-1503 U.S.A., along with a 3×5 card reading, “Please use this M&M for breeding purposes.” This week they wrote back to thank me, and sent me a coupon for a free 1/2 pound bag of plain M&Ms. I consider this “grant money.” I have set aside the weekend for a grand tournament. 36458404.review:
TL;DR: 
Graphics/Art: 100
Music/SFX: 97
Story: 92
Gameplay/Combat: 100
Multiplayer: 99
Replay Value: 100 
Stability: 100

First, lets get some things straight. Wild Animal Racing (WAR) is not a racing game. All the graphics and shots for the store pictures? They're actually ripped off a mod for MarioKart. WAR is a hectic shooter that can turn completely around in a split second. Those shots do not have anything to do with this game. WAR is actually the best game in my Steam library. A masterpiece. Graphics are high-end (Better than PUBG, R6:Siege, and really any game with amazing graphics you can think of. Music/Sound FX are simply beautiful. The soundtrack to this game is on par with Jet Set Radio. The sound effects are so realistic, you will end up turning around in your seat to make sure [said effect] wasn't happening in real life behind you. This game is also amazingly stable- it runs at a steady 60 FPS on a potato and runs extremely well on a higher-end PC with very little CPU usage. With graphics, mechanics, and taxing physics this high, WAR does a truly remarkable job in denying any bugs, crashes, or issues. Look at PUBG. It doesn't even look as good as WAR and crashes every couple of minutes on top-level, state of the art gaming PCs (according to trustworthy people who own PUBG). For $3.99, Wild Animal Racing is ridiculously underpriced and the steal of a lifetime. This review can merely understate the graciousness of WAR.

To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to understand Wild Animal Racing. The game is extremely subtle, and without a solid grasp of professional racing most of the gameplay will go over a typical gamer's head. There’s also the giraffe’s nihilistic outlook, which is deftly woven into his characterisation- his personal philosophy draws heavily from Narodnaya Volya literature, for instance. The fans understand this stuff; they have the intellectual capacity to truly appreciate the depths of the game, to realise that it's not just funny- it says something deep about LIFE. As a consequence people who dislike Wild Animal Racing truly ARE idiots- of course they wouldn’t appreciate. I’m smirking right now just imagining one of those addlepated simpletons scratching their heads in confusion as Paul Bird’s genius wit unfolds itself on their computer screens. What fools.. how I pity them. 😂

And yes, by the way, i DO have a Wild Animal Racing tattoo. And no, you cannot see it. It’s for the ladies’ eyes only- and even then they have to demonstrate that they’re within 5 IQ points of my own (preferably lower) beforehand. Nothin personnel kid 😎

35637273.review:
I thought that life had little to nothing to offer me anymore. I knew I would graduate, maybe get a nice job and family and be an average Jo. And that small, insignificant future made me... Unhappy. I knew I was born to outgo the average person, I knew that sometime in my life, an oppurtunity would come that would set me up for unadaltered greatness. I think I have finally found my passageway into true blissful divinity, and it is this video game. Never did I think I would find true happiness in a piece of media, let alone a video game; I was proven completely wrong. This game is an absolute masterpiece, and I dont even think that some of the most eliquintly spoken people can describe the pure concentrated happiness you experience when you indulge in this game. The soundtrack is that of heavenly angels blessing my ears with thousands of pitch perfect notes in complete harmony. The graphics are unspeakably realistic, which helps immerse yourself in the stunning game world the genius developers created. And speaking of the game world, it gives you plenty of time to hop out of your kart and explore the vast outdoors (A metaphor this game geniously fabricated which is applicable in the real world in that you sometimes need to let go of material possessions and indulge in mother nature)
which is a very welcome addition to the gameplay. The characters are deeply fleshed out, to the point you would think that the developers somehow figured out how to put all of someones memories, feelings, thoughts and processes into an A.I. If all I said here doesnt convince you enough that this game is the defining masterpiece of the human race, the fact that I am moving to the mountains where I will live on a strict diet of kale and wood and meditate in the icy fridge that is my cave for 18 hours a day may change your mind. I am truly a changed man after I have been introduced to this divine creation, and I hope that you can realise that everyone owes it to themselves to play this. 7.5/10 "Needs more character diversity"

34481854.review:
[b]首先, 谢谢这款游戏，他改变了我的一生[/b]
[h1] 1.游戏名称[/h1]
我们可以先看一下这个游戏的名字Wild Animal Racing，翻译过来就是野生动物赛车，这是一个多么精心的起名，一个名字就把这个游戏的内容完美含盖了，没错这个游戏就是一个动物赛车游戏，却不像有些游戏名字晦涩难懂，在名字上野生动物赛车就已经成功了.
[h1] 2.游戏内容[/h1]
这个游戏开头没有什么故事介绍，也没有什么语音提示，但这恰恰是这款游戏的魅力所在，刚刚进入游戏，你就能听到一段音乐，那音乐含蓄又不失深沉，典雅又不失带感，这就是野生动物赛车第二个吸引我的地方，本游戏虽然表面上没有剧情，然而剧情却在游戏中层层体现，没错，玩过黑暗之魂系列的玩家在此感受到那种深沉的叙事手法，是那么的相似，却又有所不同，可以说青出于蓝而胜于蓝了,你们听说过巫师3吗，那种庞大的世界构架，巫师3只能自叹不如,在玩这个游戏你可以感受到极品飞车般的驾驶感受，旁边设置的对手并不太难也不简单，每次跑完每每大汗淋漓，不禁大喊痛快,然后就是很多玩家重视的画质了，我不得不说这个游戏拥有尼尔，生化危机7和最终幻想14都无法媲美的画质，而且制作组显然耗费苦心在这个游戏的优化上，以至于基本21世纪的所以电脑都可以带动畅玩.
[h1] 3.语言[/h1]
这个游戏基本含盖了所有地球上的主流语言，这代表了什么---平等，如果你细心可以发现这个游戏吧圈数翻译成了膝部，你以为是翻译错误吗，你以为是用谷歌机翻的吗，那你就大错特错了，这么好的游戏，怎么可能会有这种低级错误，这个肯定是制作组可以为之，现在的社会是个浮躁的社会，而野生动物则代表了大自然，面对大自然，我们难道不应该献上自己的膝部吗？
[h1] 4.最后的思考[/h1]
通过这个游戏我思考了很多，了解了很多，感受了很多，这个游戏教会了我许多做人的道理，谦逊，博爱，平等，这是一种信念在支撑着每一个玩家，你有可能不喜欢这个游戏，那是你还没有真正感受过这个游戏真正的魅力，这也许不能叫做游戏了，这是我人生的导师，我生命之中的风向标。
[u] 十分感谢你读完了我的测评
如果你感到有用请点赞
只要18元就可以成就你的梦想
只要18元就可以走向人生的巅峰
再次谢谢你们读完了我的测评	[/u]

34474898.review:
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

  
Never thought I'd make it.

  
Three days grade school,
three days high school.

  
Those were awkward.

  
Three days college. I'm glad I took
a day and hitchhiked around the hive.

  
You did come back different.

  
- Hi, Barry.
- Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good.

  
- Hear about Frankie?
- Yeah.

  
- You going to the funeral?
- No, I'm not going.

  
Everybody knows,
sting someone, you die.

  
Don't waste it on a squirrel.
Such a hothead.

  
I guess he could have
just gotten out of the way.

  
I love this incorporating
an amusement park into our day.

  
That's why we don't need vacations.

  
Boy, quite a bit of pomp...
under the circumstances.

  
- Well, Adam, today we are men.
- We are!

  
- Bee-men.
- Amen!

  
Hallelujah!

  
Students, faculty, distinguished bees,

  
please welcome Dean Buzzwell.

  
Welcome, New Hive Oity
graduating class of...

  
...9:15.

  
That concludes our ceremonies.

  
And begins your career
at Honex Industries!

  
Will we pick ourjob today?

  
I heard it's just orientation.

  
Heads up! Here we go.

  
Keep your hands and antennas
inside the tram at all times.

  
- Wonder what it'll be like?
- A little scary.

  
Welcome to Honex,
a division of Honesco

  
and a part of the Hexagon Group.

  
This is it!

  
Wow.

  
Wow.

  
We know that you, as a bee,
have worked your whole life

  
to get to the point where you
can work for your whole life.

  
Honey begins when our valiant Pollen
Jocks bring the nectar to the hive.

  
Our top-secret formula

  
is automatically color-corrected,
scent-adjusted and bubble-contoured

  
into this soothing sweet syrup

  
with its distinctive
golden glow you know as...

  
Honey!

  
- That girl was hot.
- She's my cousin!

  
- She is?
- Yes, we're all cousins.

  
- Right. You're right.
- At Honex, we constantly strive

  
to improve every aspect
of bee existence.

  
These bees are stress-testing
a new helmet technology.

  
- What do you think he makes?
- Not enough.

  
Here we have our latest advancement,
the Krelman.

  
- What does that do?
- Oatches that little strand of honey

  
that hangs after you pour it.
Saves us millions.

  
Oan anyone work on the Krelman?

  
Of course. Most bee jobs are
small ones. But bees know

  
that every small job,
if it's done well, means a lot.

  
But choose carefully

  
because you'll stay in the job
you pick for the rest of your life.

  
The same job the rest of your life?
I didn't know that.

  
What's the difference?

  
You'll be happy to know that bees,
as a species, haven't had one day off

  
in 27 million years.

  
So you'll just work us to death?

  
We'll sure try.

  
Wow! That blew my mind!

  
"What's the difference?"
How can you say that?

  
One job forever?
That's an insane choice to have to make.

  
I'm relieved. Now we only have
to make one decision in life.

  
But, Adam, how could they
never have told us that?

  
Why would you question anything?
We're bees.

  
We're the most perfectly
functioning society on Earth.

  
You ever think maybe things
work a little too well here?

  
Like what? Give me one example.

  
I don't know. But you know
what I'm talking about.

  
Please clear the gate.
Royal Nectar Force on approach.

  
Wait a second. Oheck it out.

  
- Hey, those are Pollen Jocks!
- Wow.

  
I've never seen them this close.

  
They know what it's like
outside the hive.

  
Yeah, but some don't come back.

  
- Hey, Jocks!
- Hi, Jocks!

  
You guys did great!

  
You're monsters!
You're sky freaks! I love it! I love it!

  
- I wonder where they were.
- I don't know.

  
Their day's not planned.

  
Outside the hive, flying who knows
where, doing who knows what.

  
You can'tjust decide to be a Pollen
Jock. You have to be bred for that.

  
Right.

  
Look. That's more pollen
than you and I will see in a lifetime.

  
It's just a status symbol.
Bees make too much of it.

  
Perhaps. Unless you're wearing it
and the ladies see you wearing it.

  
Those ladies?
Aren't they our cousins too?

  
Distant. Distant.

  
Look at these two.

  
- Oouple of Hive Harrys.
- Let's have fun with them.

  
It must be dangerous
being a Pollen Jock.

  
Yeah. Once a bear pinned me
against a mushroom!

  
He had a paw on my throat,
and with the other, he was slapping me!

  
- Oh, my!
- I never thought I'd knock him out.

  
What were you doing during this?

  
Trying to alert the authorities.

  
I can autograph that.

  
A little gusty out there today,
wasn't it, comrades?

  
Yeah. Gusty.

  
We're hitting a sunflower patch
six miles from here tomorrow.

  
- Six miles, huh?
- Barry!

  
A puddle jump for us,
but maybe you're not up for it.

  
- Maybe I am.
- You are not!

  
We're going 0900 at J-Gate.

  
What do you think, buzzy-boy?
Are you bee enough?

  
I might be. It all depends
on what 0900 means.

  
Hey, Honex!

  
Dad, you surprised me.

  
You decide what you're interested in?

  
- Well, there's a lot of choices.
- But you only get one.

  
Do you ever get bored
doing the same job every day?

  
Son, let me tell you about stirring.

  
You grab that stick, and you just
move it around, and you stir it around.

  
You get yourself into a rhythm.
It's a beautiful thing.

  
You know, Dad,
the more I think about it,

  
maybe the honey field
just isn't right for me.

  
You were thinking of what,
making balloon animals?

  
That's a bad job
for a guy with a stinger.

  
Janet, your son's not sure
he wants to go into honey!

  
- Barry, you are so funny sometimes.
- I'm not trying to be funny.

  
You're not funny! You're going
into honey. Our son, the stirrer!

  
- You're gonna be a stirrer?
- No one's listening to me!

  
Wait till you see the sticks I have.

  
I could say anything right now.
I'm gonna get an ant tattoo!

  
Let's open some honey and celebrate!

  
Maybe I'll pierce my thorax.
Shave my antennae.

  
Shack up with a grasshopper. Get
a gold tooth and call everybody "dawg"!

  
I'm so proud.

  
- We're starting work today!
- Today's the day.

  
Oome on! All the good jobs
will be gone.

  
Yeah, right.

  
Pollen counting, stunt bee, pouring,
stirrer, front desk, hair removal...

  
- Is it still available?
- Hang on. Two left!

  
One of them's yours! Oongratulations!
Step to the side.

  
- What'd you get?
- Picking crud out. Stellar!

  
Wow!

  
Oouple of newbies?

  
Yes, sir! Our first day! We are ready!

  
Make your choice.

  
- You want to go first?
- No, you go.

  
Oh, my. What's available?

  
Restroom attendant's open,
not for the reason you think.

  
- Any chance of getting the Krelman?
- Sure, you're on.

  
I'm sorry, the Krelman just closed out.

  
Wax monkey's always open.

  
The Krelman opened up again.

  
What happened?

  
A bee died. Makes an opening. See?
He's dead. Another dead one.

  
Deady. Deadified. Two more dead.

  
Dead from the neck up.
Dead from the neck down. That's life!

  
Oh, this is so hard!

  
Heating, cooling

34246937.review:
On the island of Zig-Zag-Zog, in the sea of Ooberdeedoo,
Are some amazing creatures, that you would never see in a zoo!
They walk upright on two legs, like some kind of aliens from Mars,
But the strangest thing, (you would not believe!) is that these animals are driving cars!

A giraffe that bleats, a hippo that moos, they are the strangest beasts,
But that's not the strangest thing, my dear, they're standing on their two feets!
How did this happen? (I ask you!) How did these things evolve?
I'm determined to find out, you know, with all of my resolve!

Some say it was a meteorite, that gave them super powers,
Some say it was the weather, some say it was magic flowers.
Some say they simply did evolve, like apes evolved to men,
Some say it was the Man Upstairs who gave new life to them.

All I know is that they're here! I've seen them with my eyes,
I've seen their island, and their homes from my helicopter in the skys.
I've seen them race around all day in a racetrack made from stone.
I wish more people could see this. But I'm the only one.

So I brought them here to Europe. They've signed on the dotted line,
Now people pay to see them race, and the money is all mine!
You see there's something more amazing than animals in cars,
And that's the magic of contract law and drinking in bars.

About Wild Animal Racing
Wild Animal Racing is an exciting go-kart simulation game with a twist. Play as an elephant, a lion, a zebra, a giraffe, a rhino or a hippo! Play against the other animals or against a friend on the same computer with the split-screen mode! Or invite Steam friends in the multiplayer mode!

As the game progresses you will gain access to exclusive animations that may reveal the secret of the strange animal monsters. Where did they come from and where are they going? But not only that you can take control of the animals and race them around the tracks!

Race your car around tracks in Egypt, Paris and Holland in the World Tour!

Drive your car around the coast and around the rim of a volcano in Iceland!

Collect the Diamonds For Extra Speed!

Pick up weapons such as rockets, a sledge hammer, or wheel spikes to knock your opponents off course!

All In Amazing 3d Graphics!
A Super Crazy Fun Game For Everyone!
app Features

six Characters to Choose From!
two Players Can Play On One Device!
four themed Cups!
twelve Unique Tracks!
multiple Comedy Weapons

33969387.review: This game... Wow. It is going to be hard for me to put in words how much I love this game, but I'll try. I bought this game for $3.99 (Such a low price for such an amazing game!) and was very excited to play it. I load it up, and see the beautifully crafted title screen, which has a close up of the giraffe character (sorry, I am still learning the names) driving their kart. This is a work of art, and should be put in a mueseum. It is up there in the ranks of The Mona Lisa, and Starry Night. This game has a multiplayer function, so you can play online or with a friend locally! This is such an amazing feature. I have grown closer to my family and friends playing this game. Next, is the soundtrack, and oh my goodness, is it wonderful! The songs sound amazing, and never get old! The tracks that are in the game are amazing, and extremely creative. I don't know how you do it, Paul. Next are the characters. There is the giraffe, the elephant, the lioness, the zebra, the rhino, and my personal favortie, the hippo. These characters have a unique playstyle, which makes it fun to play as all of them. The movies you unlock through playing the games offer lore and backstory to these character. Speaking of which, the movies give you an insentive to keep on playing the game. What wacky adventures will these wild animals go on next? That is the question I asked myself as I played, so I raced on, trying to get as much points as I could. I unlocked the dance scene, which costs 5000 points. It showed the giraffe, elephant and hippo dancing in a beautifully crafted room. The way they were dancing was very sexy, (not to mention they were naked!) so shield your child's eyes from that scene. The racing itself controls fluently. I'm a personal fan of the games control scheme. When driving, you don't hold forward, it goes by itself, making this game very realistic. It also stops thumb cramps. The items are very creative, and I have never seen anything like them before! The rocket item you can shoot forward, blasting your opponents out of the way! The bubble shields you from danger, but you can also pop it to surprise your foes! The hammer item lets you hit opponents next to you, making them spin out. My personal favorite, though, is the bannana peel item. It takes the popular gag of slipping on a bannana peel and puts it into a racing game! Truly genius! The AI is very advanced, too. I noticed that the animals were very competitive, and wanted to win first place, like their life depended on it. They even pushed eachother, and even me, sometimes! I guess that is where they get the title 'Wild Animals'. Overall, this game looks, sounds, and controls amazingly. I'd suggest you buy it, if you haven't already.

33963682.review: As a young boy growing up in Greenland, it was a rough beginning to my life. I spent most of my time out of school hunting wolves for dinner with my dad. I didn't have many friends because there was no one in a 75 mile radius of my home. After one season of hunting I had my 8th Birthday. My dad spend half of his life savings on my present. It was this game I had never heard of called Wild Animal Racing. I played it non-stop on my little monitor powered by our sled dogs on a treadmill spinning an electrical generator. I couldn't stop, it was an addiction. The in depth character design and the heartwrenching wins and defeats were all apart of the game I wished to devote my life to. After seeing the 2000+ points being added to my score, I never wanted anything more but to be the best. I spent the next 14 years of my life training and training hard. Every hour I wasn't working to feed my dogs to run the computer, I spent practicing every corner and every secret shortcut there was in this game. I researched it day and night and found a great source for guides and tips, Wild Animal Channel. Doing all this only encouraged me to press on. Then one day I received a letter via my mail pigeon. It read that some important people had been tracking my prgress in the game. They had decided to invite me to McCall, Idaho to compete in the World Racing League Directed by Wild Animal Racing, 3rd Generation (WRLDWAR3 for short). I couldn't stop crying, my dream finally came true. I was going to the big leagues, to play with my heros. Life couldn't get any better. I set off immediately with my dogs and joystick which i used for racing and went straight to idaho. 3 of my dogs drowned on the way there, 6 died from dehydration, but I rode into McCall with 5 dogs left. It was like a whole different world to me, I couldn't beleive my eyes. There were actual people, it was whacky, as we say it in greenland. I was nearly late to the tournement, it was in the basement of a pub off of main street. There was an enourmous turnout and my heart was beating faster than that one time I was almost eaten alive by wolves. This was it, this was my chance to prove myself that I was not just going down in history to be a kid from greenland, no, I was going to be a legend. I sat down in my chair and scoped out the competition. It wasn't much, just a couple of old chubby guys and one empty chair. I was curious as to why this competitor wasn't here yet as the match would start any minute, but I soon found out. The first time I saw Robbie Magistrelli was when he walked on stage, not to mention I didn't even know there was a stage, but the crowd was cheering and whistleing as he waved. He was a tall slim italien man and was wearing all Nike brand, clearly sponsored, and his yellow lensed gaming goggles. The moment I my eyes on him I was filled with rage, but I kept it in. We all sat down and prepared for the race, I was last in the draw and was forced to pick the elephant, which everyone knows is the slowest animal by default, but I told myself it was the racer, not the animal. Robbie was his classic ginger the Giraffe, one of the best picks anyone could ask for. Then we went to choose the map set, World Tour, as it was the only one anyone ever played. The races were close, Robbie was in first by a small amount and I was following close in second, it was a nail biter every race, but the deciding race was the Volcano map. What a intense map that is. At this level of play it was all about the items you get, and wether or not luck was favoring you that day. I got off to a somewhat slow start but it was no biggie, thankfully no one got the bananas the whole round. But as I neared the final curve just a few inches behind Robbie, he sneezed and missed the item box. I saw my oppertunity. I prayed a quick prayer as I picked it up, "Missiles, Missiles please". I grabbed it. Time seemed to stand still, I look to the bottom left of my screen and... It was bubble gum. To this day I never understood the use of it, never understood why it was even in the game! But as I crossed the finish line behind Robbie, as he stood up and the crowd cheered for his victory, I realized something. Life isn't about what you look like, or what possesions you have, it's who you are and what you go thorugh that define you. Realizing it wasn't my fault that I lost the tournament that day changed me, realizing that I was a different and better person because of that experince was arguably the best thing that could ever happen to me. If there is one thing I want everyone to take away from my story, it's that you don't always win, there isn't always a happy ending given to you, but instead, it's what you make of your life that is what it becomes. Thank you

33949483.review:
最高のレースゲーム。このようなレースゲームだと通常スタートポジションは速いプレイヤーほど前に置かれるものだが、このゲームでは動物によって固定されている。つまり、強者は圧倒的不利な位置にいるライオンを使用し、弱者は先頭にいるキリンやシマウマを使うことによるバランス是正もできるのだ。また逆に元来のレースゲームのように強者を先頭に、弱者を後続にすることもできる。つまりゲームバランスはこちらで大きく調整できるのだ。

また、アイテム面に置いてもこのゲームには賞賛すべき点が多々ある。例えばバナナである。これは一見後続を圧倒的に不利にさせるバランスのことを全く考えていないくっそ激烈に強力なアイテムと思われがちだが、このバナナが設置されるのは自分の進路にあわせてであり、次の周回で自分のコースを遮るリスクを持ち合わせている。また前方に放つことのできるロケットも狙いにくさが目につき、アイテムを取得する運での左右は比較的に少ない。アイテム取得自体はメリットだけでなくデメリットとして何の役に立つのかがいまだにプレイヤーの中で議論が繰り返されているフーセンガムのようなバリアがあげられる。これは使用中速度が若干落ち、コンマ数秒を争うといわれるレースの世界では致命的なロスとなってしまう。

ここまでバランスの良いゲームが他にあるだろうか？プレイヤーに求められるのはレースのセンス、道端に散乱するバナナを避けるテクニック、何らかの事故にあっても即座にリカバリーするセンスであり、これは正統派なレースゲームとして評価されるべきだろう。

33733387.review:
※本レビューはフィクションであり、登場する人物、団体等、名称は実在のものとは関係ありません。

日暮里にある月島組は銀星会傘下の二次組織である。
事務所応接間のソファにデンと座った月島はセブンスターを取り出すと、月島組若頭の島田が全く無駄のない動作で火を点ける。
「島田、今週取り掛かれるシノギを挙げろ」
島田はプリントアウトした用紙をチラと見たがその表情は芳しくない。
「はぁ、今週は特にないですね」
「特にないってなんだよ！なめてんのか！」
月島が島田の腰を蹴りつけ、島田の顔が苦痛に歪む。
「見せてみろ」
島田の持っている紙をひったくると、確かにそれらしいシノギになりそうな情報はない。が、気になる案件がひとつ目に止まった。
「ドバイのモーターレース…優勝賞金800万ドル。支払いはアメリカドルだとさ」
「いえ、さすがに海外レース参入はウチの組でもムリかと、ましてドバイ首長国ですよ？」
元は福岡の組から西側の川田遊興会へ回ってきた案件だったが、さすがに海外モータースポーツとヤクザに接点はないので、あまりにも出し抜けな内容を持て余し、タダ同然で東側の日暮里にまで回りに回ってきた情報だった。
「どんなもんでもシノギにすんだよ！ったく頭の鈍い野郎だ」
月島はまたも島田の腿を蹴り上げる。
「ひとりできそうな奴を知ってるぞ」
月島はスマートフォンを取り出し、どこぞに電話をかける。
「おう、樺山か。今どこに居るんだ？江戸川？ボートか。飽きないなお前も。カネになる話があるんだ。今夜ウチの店に来いよ」
一方的に通話を切るとスマートフォンをテーブルにガツッと投げ出し、月島はセブンスターの濃い紫煙を吐き出した。

裏社会に対する常識的な言葉がひとつある。
「ヤクザとは関わってはいけない。1度関わったら死ぬまでヤクザは付きまとって縁が切れない」

樺山は川田オートレース場の元オートレーサーで、今は引退している。正規に引退レースまで行っての幕引きだったが実情は違う。樺山は余暇のドライブで月島組関係者の車と事故を起こしたことがあった。前日のレースの出来が良く、調子に乗って飲酒運転をしていたのが運の尽きである。この事故は月島組が樺山を知っており、オートレーサーとしての処分を恐れた樺山に対して"好意"で示談にしてもらったのだが、以降、月島組との関係ができてしまった。この事故で樺山は一生後悔することになる。
ある時、月島組組長、月島洋次の実子である月島周（あまね）が、樺山に八百長を持ちかけた。オートレース関係者やファンの目は肥えている。樺山ひとりが八百長走行をしたところで、すぐにバレてしまうのは明白なため断りたかったが、飲酒運転の弱みを握られているので断りきれなかった。月島も樺山だけで八百長が成功するとは思っておらず、どこをどうしたのか、レース場の関係者や組の兵隊を多数動因して、他のレーサーのバイクが微妙な不調になるよう細工してしまい、八百長レースは成立してしまった。
1ヶ月ほどして川田オートレース場のフロント会議に出頭させられた。川田では水面下で内偵を行っており、八百長レースの首謀者のひとりが樺山であることを割り出したのだ。樺山は自分の不手際とヤクザ絡みの末に行ったことまでは吐いたが、月島組の名前は出さなかった。言えば自分の命は無いだろうと思ったのだ。結果的に川田では件のレースを闇に葬ることにした。既に着順の確定したレースであまりにも多数の人間が関与していることが解り、スキャンダルになれば経産省の大規模な手入れは免れられない。最悪の場合、川田オートレース場は閉鎖されてしまうことすら考えられるからだ。川田は樺山に引退することを条件にコトを収める事にした。体調不良を理由に引退宣言させ、引退レースも行う。ただし樺山は今度一切オートレース関係者に会う事、場内への出入り禁止を命じられた。事実上の業界永久追放処分である。

日暮里のバーは月島組がフロントで営業している店だった。
中に入ると薄暗い店内の奥にサングラスをかけた月島がこちらを手招きしており、隣に若頭の島田が控えている。ソファに腰掛けると島田が水割りを作り、樺山に突き出した。どんな話なのかを考えると、口をつける気にはならない。
「まあ飲めよ」
と月島に強要されるようにどうにか口だけはつけた。月島はいきなり話し始める。
「相変わらず無職か？」
「ええ、まあ」
「お前、2輪も4輪も速いよな？」
「トルクに乗ればどっちも同じです」
月島は少し解らないような表情をしたが言葉を続けた。
「4輪のレースがある。優勝したらお前に5000万やる」
「レース…ですか」
「英語ぐらいできたよな？」
「できますが…」
「ヒンディー語は？」
「えっ（……何人と俺を組ませる気なんだこいつは…）」
「今から少しは勉強しとけ」
「一体どこでレースがあるんですか」
「ドバイ」
「……」
「ドバイのリゾート地にあるサーキットだ。すっごいリゾート地だぞ。主催者は親日家でさ、"日本最強のレーサーを呼んでくれ"って言うんだ」
「……」
「そんなだからきっと現地の待遇もいいぞ。いいなー」
「……（"いいなー"じゃねえよ…）」
「優勝賞金はアメリカドルで800万だ。でかいレースだぞ。樺山、お前にもう一花咲かせるチャンスをやるよ」
「ちょっと待ってください、賞金が800万ドルでなんで俺の取り分が5000万円なんですか」
「島田」
「はい」
「ちゃんと説明してやれって言ったろうがー！こいつ察し悪ぃし！」
月島が島田を殴り飛ばすと、島田は別なテーブルまで吹っ飛ばされ、ボトルやグラスが派手に割れる音が響き渡った。月島は非常に凶暴でキレやすい。女なのに異様に喧嘩が強く、ハジキでも石ころでもボールペンでもなんでもあるものを使って喧嘩は無敗と聞く。だがカタギは殴らない。月島自身、組長の実子でありながらカタギを自称している。実子である以上、マル暴にカタギ扱いされるわけはないのだが、指摘したら最期、バラされて東京湾の魚のエサになっていることだろう。そのくせ、ギャンブルになると人が変わったと思うほどに冷静で、賭け事もまた異様に強いという。
鼻血をぬぐいながら島田が「すいません」と立ち上がって樺山に説明を始めた。
「えー、つまりですね、賞金の振り分けですが、ウチの仲介料、ドバイ現地でのチームを雇う資金、あなたのドバイでの生活費、雑費等々、ドバイのレースに参加するにはタネ銭が要るわけです。タネ銭は高額すぎてウチでは手配しきれませんので、金主（闇金融などに裏金を提供している財界人）から借り入れるわけですが、高額の利子をつけての返済となります。これら諸経費を計算するとあなたの取り分は5000万円となるわけです」
月島が島田の説明を継ぐ。
「俺が金主に頭を下げてカネを借りるんだけどさ、高額だしそれ相当の担保も必要だと思うわけ」
厭な予感がする。
「で、お前の再婚した奥さんと娘さん、若いじゃない？ふたりを担保に入れて借りちゃおうよ」
樺山は背筋が凍るような思いがした。ヤクザの話のクセとして核心的にヤバイ話はどこか気軽な語尾になる。「殺っちゃえばいいじゃない」とか「埋めちゃおうよ」とか「今からそっち行くよ」なんて電話があった日には事務所を襲撃したりする。一般人がイメージしているような恫喝めいたセリフはそこにはない。そんなのは映画やテレビドラマだけの話だ。
絹恵の顔を思い浮かべる。まだ23歳。自分と再婚してくれたのが不思議なくらいできた若女房で、オートレースを引退した時も、厭な顔ひとつせず、「新しい生活のスタートね」などと自分を励ましたぐらいだ。自分の連れ子である娘は「お父さんは今大変だろうし」と、生活費を入れるために高校を中退して働きに出てくれている。そんなふたりを売れというのか。当然オートレース界から永久追放された件は話していない。
「手付けで500万やるからさ。ドバイ入りまでこいつで家族と旨いものでも食ってこいよ」
テーブルに分厚い封筒を差し出される。ゲンナマで手付けを渡された。樺山に断る選択肢は無いということだった。


──ドバイはオートドローム。
太陽光眩しい巨大リゾート地に作られた、ドバイグランプリも開催されるこの有名サーキットに自分が足を踏み入れ、まさかドライバーとして参加するなどとは夢にも思わなかった。現地入りして軽く探したが、当然のように月島たちは居ない。
コミッショナーに会いに行くとクーフィーヤを被った髭のアラブ人に歓迎された。どうやら日本からの参戦を喜んでいるらしい。しかし妙な事もあった。遊園地に居るようなヴィヴィッド色の動物を模した着ぐるみを手渡されたのだ。着ぐるみはなんの因果か、ドングリみたいに目の飛び出た冗談じみている意匠をした"紫色のカバ"だった。
今すぐこれを着ろと言う。そしてプライベートが確保できる手配済みのホテル以外で着脱してはならない、自分の素顔を晒したり誰であるかも絶対に他人に悟られたり、話したりしてはいけないと命じられる。仮に身元がバレたらどうなるのだろうか？普通ではないアラブ人の雰囲気を感じ取ると、樺山にそこまで訊く勇気は出なかった。
サーキットに行くとチームクルーと面通しした。クルーは全員インド人だった。英語はあまり通じるとは言えず、月島の"ヒンディー語を勉強しておけ"の意味がようやく解った。英語で「レースは何日開催なんだ？」と訊くと「5日"ぐらい"」との返事が返ってくる。"ぐらい"とは何なのだろうか。樺山はインド人特有の日時に対するアバウトさにイライラしてきていた。マシンを見に行くと"ただの"レーシングカートがそこにあった。このカバの着ぐるみでカートに乗れというのか？状況の不穏さに着ぐるみの中が汗でびっしょりになる。
そういえば出国前、月島が「困ったらこれを開けろ」と手渡してきたものがある。神田明神のお守りだった。当時はお守りで優勝祈願とはヤクザらしいなとしか思わなかったが、藁にもすがる思いでお守りの袋を開ける。

そこには切れっぱしになった新聞折込みの黄色いチラシの裏に、月島によると思われる鉛筆手書きのメモが入っていた。
＜レースは現地時間で8日の正午スタート。全4戦、各3ラウンドだ＞
＜マシンは120cc。最高のセッティングのものを用意したが、所詮カートだ。他のドライバーのマシンと大差は出ないだろう＞
＜インド人の言う事を真に受けるな。半分冗談ぐらいに思っておけ＞
＜参加ドライバーはお前の他に5人。全員表のレースで走れなくなったプロだ＞
＜その中でひとり、フォーミュラ1で走ってた奴がいる。走りのクセでそいつが誰なのか見抜け＞
＜これは賭けレースだ。コッミッショナーも観客も賭けてる。全員賭け事のプロでパドックの時点でレーサーが誰かを検討つけてオッズがつく＞
＜だがお前は裏レースでも無名だ。高額オッズが確実につく。カネがあれば自分に全額賭けとけ＞
＜賞金は優勝者にしか出ないから、2着、3着で甘えようとすると賞金は1ドルも持ち帰れない。保険で自分に賭けておくのを重ねて勧める＞
＜日本で言い忘れていたんだが＞
＜1戦ごとのドライバーズポイント最下位のドライバーは、着ぐるみを剥ぎ取られて処刑ショーが開催される。これも興行の一環だ＞
＜処刑に使われるシミターという刀はよく砥がれて切れ味抜群らしい。苦しまずに首を刎ねてくれると思うので、そこは安心して欲しい＞
＜お前が優勝して東京に凱旋してくるのを祈っている＞

樺山はグシャとチラシを握り潰した。その横を「あと3ラップ"ぐらい"」と書かれたプラカードを手にしたインド人が通り過ぎる。
クソッタレ！最低でも総合3位に入賞しないと生きて日本に帰れないじゃないか！あの女（やろう）！処刑の話はわざとしなかったな！


──ヤクザとは関わってはいけない。1度関わったら死ぬまでヤクザは付きまとって縁が切れない。
樺山の文字通り命を賭けた、野生動物のレースはこれから始まろうとしていた。

33425715.review:
Wild Animal Racing has brought me hours of entertainment. Okay 1.6 hours, but come on, anything over five rounds up. Only true gamers play this game. The competition? Fierce. The music? Five Star. Character selection? Outstanding. Weight/Bumper car mechanics? HERO MODE, INSTA DEATH, WHY DO YOU DO THIS TO  ME. Seriously. Play the game, you'll understand. Unfortunately I am not quite as skilled as my dear friend who severely bested me at this game, however I will surely train harder, and one day I shall beat him. One day. The character badges really flesh out the characters, I mean without them, how would I have ever learned that the Rhino's hobbies include running from poachers? That's just good story writing.


 If you want a life of happiness, you should buy this game. This is the perfect game for all ages, all social statuses. 


Got a friend? Get them Wild Animal Racing. A Girlfriend? Wild Animal Racing. A sworn enemy? Wild Animal Racing. Want to confuse the ever living daylight of some poor, unfortunate soul on your friends' list? Wild Animal Racing! 



P.S. Please tell me I am not the only one who had a fit of laughter over the music of Iceland, where it jumps from being all casual, lazy to suddenly hardrock.

33360554.review:
[b]語彙力のないのが書きたいこと書いただけなのでおｋな方だけ[/b]
∟このレビューの投稿者は実績コンプする程度はプレイしています

[h1]まず俺個人としての評価としては[/h1]
∟最高にクソな操作性と最高にクソな見た目してるくせに駆け引きだけはまじで必要で楽しめる
　[b]「が」[/b]
　クソゲーには違いないからクソゲーをやっても楽しめる方だけ買おう

　劣悪な操作性、スピード感のなさ、どこぞの芸術家がデザインしたような意味不なキャラデザ
　パッと見はいいとこがない・・・とおもうじゃん？

　[b]そのとおりでございます、でもわりとやってるとクセになる[/b]

　真っ直ぐ走ることすら困難なシビアな操作に意固地になり
　１つのアイテムで制限時間いっぱいまでアイテム連打してしまう発狂感（マ○カーの金キノコ的な）
　他キャラと接触すればお互いクラッシュレベルの制御不能に陥るハラハラ感
　おまけという名の電子ドラッグというか謎のなにか
　エキサイト翻訳でも使ったのかわけのわからん日本語に失笑

[h1]まとめると[/h1]
セール時にフレンドに送りつける地雷としては最高に楽しいゲームだと思いますが、オススメというよりクソゲー好きならやっていいんじゃない？って感じです

33240188.review:
このゲームは奇ゲー・バカゲーの類でありますが、レース部分の出来が壊滅的なのでクソゲーと言ってしまっても問題はないでしょう。
もしあなたがクソゲーハンターならお宝です。
そうでないなら間違っても手を出すべきではありません。

[h1] 評価点 [/h1] 
・日本語対応
・6人対戦ができる
・ポイントで解禁できるラリって作ったと思われるご褒美動画

[h1] 問題点・不満点 [/h1] 
・エキサイト翻訳でぐちゃぐちゃな日本語
・キーコンフィグがない
・そもそもオプションが言語変更しかない
・他のCPU、プレイヤーにぶつかると急停止してしまう
・後退時操作がタイヤの向きを意識しないといけない
・スピード感がない
・ドリフトがない
・アイテム使用が左CTRLなので発動しづらい
・アイテムのバナナが凶悪すぎる
・一部コースが狭すぎる
・アイテムを当てても即復帰、減速地形の影響を受けないズルいCPU
・同キャラ対戦ができない
・最大6人対戦しかできない
・動物によってスタート位置が固定されている。

[h1] アイテム紹介 [/h1] 
・黄色いひし形
マ○オカートで言えばコイン。
コース上にそこそこの数が配置されており、取りまくると最高速度が1kmずつスピードアップするらしいのですが、集めてる暇があったらインを攻めて走ったほうが速い。

・ピンクの風船?(一説によるとガムらしい)
使うと自分が遅くなる。つまりはハズレアイテムでゴミ。

・ミサイル(ロケット?)
連射可能だが、一切ホーミングせず。
相手に超至近距離で当てると自分も巻きこまれるのでゴミ。
コースの障害物等に当たると反発して攻撃効果を失う。

・ハンマー
キーボードだと左CTRLをいちいち押さないと振ってくれない。
CPUや対戦相手を叩くとほんのちょびっと得点が手に入る。

・タイヤからトゲ
使用感とポイントが入るところはハンマーと同じだけど一回発動すれば時間内はずっと攻撃できるので上位互換。
でも攻撃できる時間が短すぎる。

・ [b] バナナ [/b] 
このゲームの最強武器にしてバランスブレイカー。
時間内無限置き可能かつ地上空中問わず置けるという極悪性能。
短い間隔で敷き詰められたら、スリップ回復後近くのバナナにさらに引っかかって延々とバナナを踏み続けるコンボすら起きるため、これが敷き詰められたら勝負にならない。
さらに空中に置けばジャンプ多用でコーナーを鋭く曲がり障害物を飛び越えるガチ勢ですら叩き潰せる。
でもこれを禁じるとレースで逆転は不可能というジレンマ。

[h1]  最難関の実績[/h1]
"画面分割の二人プレイで1位2位同時入賞"という実績があります。


…もう一度書きます。
二　人　同　時　プ　レ　イ　の　実　績　が　あ　り　ま　す　。
ご褒美動画全解禁でもマルチ対戦で勝つことでもなく！
大画面のモニタとコントローラー2つ(もしくはキーボード2つ)もですが、まず一緒にこのゲームをプレイしてくれる友達が必要ってところが難しいです。
友達はいますか？

[h1] まとめ[/h1] 
お粗末なレース部分、不安定な挙動、エキサイト翻訳で笑いの域に達している日本語。
これらが許せるならばあなたは絶対にレースに参加するべきです。
でも定価はおすすめできないのでセール時に買うといいでしょう。
アルコールを摂取してフレンドと深夜にやると面白いです。

大型アプデは望めないのでコースと動物、対戦可能人数が増えた2を出して欲しいところ。

[h1]  最後に注意 [/h1]
対戦はローカルでしか出来ません。

33223055.review:
面白いです。特に悪乗り好きなフレンドを集ってプレイすると凄い。

制限時間中アイテムを無限に使えるためミサイルは板野サーカスばりに撃ちまくれるし、バナナはクラスター爆弾の弾頭が全部起爆失敗したみたいな有様になります。

最初はジャパリパークに行くためにドラッグをキメすぎたヤク中が見てる夢が多分こんな有様だろう的な印象だったのですが、考えは完全に変わりました。

ただあくまで「仲の良いフレンド」とプレイするのではなく、「悪ノリを許してくれる、最後の周回でバナナだらけにされてしまい永遠にスピンしてゴールできなくても怒らず笑ってくれるフレンド」とプレイしてください。下手すると友人を失います。

33181669.review:
[h1]免踩油門＆剎車、只用方向盤玩、限速壓六十以下的賽車遊戲哪裡找？[/h1]
[h1]不用想了…就是這款神作。你沒看錯[/h1]

簡單一個前進＆倒退檔作切換，連油門＆煞車都不設計出來讓你加速＆減速
擺明要讓玩家在「恆速狀態」下公平競速，好設計！

玩過一些卡丁車競速遊戲的我，初次把全動物全賽道攻略完成
…竟然會讓我玩到頭暈想吐，這擬真感很不錯！

耐玩性也很棒！不僅有多人連線遊玩、還有蒐集金幣（？
解鎖動物好友們的日常影片、以及隱藏彩蛋！
[spoiler]或許放個動物好友們的Porn影片，遊戲瞬間獲得壓倒性好評。[/spoiler]

裡面各種向馬車64致敬的賽道，當你玩馬車覺得不會感到頭暈的時候
那便是你該入手這款擬真向賽車遊戲的時候了。

7/5更新評論：
[H1]可以支援方向盤！
而且操控性居然比Xbox ONE手把好，這是什麼巫術！？[/H1]

提供一些小要領：
 [*]在被其他動物卡住或自己卡死的情況下，打倒退檔能救你一命，免去得重跑一次的困擾。
 [*]車身跳躍可跳過一些比較矮的障礙物。
 [*]輔助道具根本沒屁用，抄捷徑撞車輛死角比較有用。
 [*]有段時間車身傾斜是正常現象，最好別跟其他車撞在一起。

33173548.review: Na początku chciałem kupić GTA 5. Ale zobaczyłęm tą grę odłożyłem wszystkie zakupy na bok! To samo mnie przyciągneło, ta realistyczna grafika, otwarty świat, rozbudowana fabuła, wątki poboczne. Naprawde świtny RPG, ale i tak największe wrażenie robią rozwoje postaci, cutscenki oraz dialogi aktorów które robią na graczu miłe wrażenie, gdy są idealnie dopasowanę do mówiących. 32592842.review:
Experience of a lifetime.

If you are only recently into PC gaming, you probably only played the mainstream games. CS, source games, free steam games, and other popular steam titles. You probably encountered some games that do not run so well on your machine, letting you down, most of the time being too late to refund because you spent your afternoon trying to fix it, and it passed 2 hours. You probably made some friends with the same passions, too.

This game is different. It doesn't have crazy system requirements, size or anything.
It's paid, so you can't really install it, launch it and think "nah waste of time gonna play cs bye".
It's multiplayer feature is the bread and butter of the game. Due to the game's graphic and gameplay simplicity, you will definetly have a lot of laughs with your friends. The AI are focused on winning, so you and your friends will have good competition. 

The only thing I didn't like about the game are the power ups. They feel useless, and barely ever do anything.

Overall, I played this with my friends for the irony, and ended up having pure fun.

32199180.review:
各位看到这篇评测的亲爱的玩家，你们知道世界上最可贵的是什么么？
财富？爱情？诚信的品质？
不，都不是。最重要的，是谦逊。
如果你认真的看过这个游戏的介绍中的画面（也就是评论区上面的那个地方），你会知道，什么才是真正的谦逊。
你以为那些是游戏内的真实画面么？不，这只是游戏开发者的一个小小的谦虚之举。
如果一定要和其他游戏比较，单独从画面上说，大概有看门狗2的水平吧。
其实画面不是最主要的。这个游戏最重要的是它感人至深的剧情——你们玩过上古卷轴5么？就是那种宏大的世界构架。再配上黑魂那样的深沉的叙事手法——你知道这意味这么什么么？
神作。
再加上那仿佛来自未来的音乐——就像《云图》中的作曲家听到了来自未来餐厅的音乐，像棋手们看到了ALPHAGO左右互搏的棋谱一样。在我听到这个游戏的BGM的一瞬间，我就知道，这是未来。
如果一定要我给这个游戏打一个分数来作为衡量标准的话（实际上打分对这款游戏是一种侮辱），那大概是11分吧。除此之外，我找不到任何其他的方式来表达这个游戏的优秀了。
我不知道2020年的游戏是什么样的。但我知道，2100年的游戏一定是这样的——像Wild Animal Racing一样。
谢谢你认真读完这篇评测。
难道你还没有想要购买的的冲动么？
去吧！

32042926.review:
深深震撼了我的心灵，好的游戏无需多说。里面的更深层次的内涵还需我们自行去体会。我玩游戏也玩了几年了，各种3a大作那个没玩过，但是野生动物赛车让游戏的意义发挥到了一个巅峰，也许游戏截图看起来那么不尽人意，不过真正的神作是不会在乎画面的。游戏中有几个值得令人深思的地方：
1.为什么这些动物与我们所见的不一样，会走路？这就是作者要表现的地方，动物会走路，有人的动作与神态。作者把这些日常所见的动物拟人化了，本是禽兽的它们变成了人，动物的低贱与人的高贵行成了鲜明的对比，自然就是想要表达出自己对现实社会中资本主义的鄙弃。
2.游戏中的一个彩蛋。大家都知道，点了眼睛后会出现一个小游戏。也许这不足为奇，不就是一个彩蛋吗，对吧但是放在这款游戏中意义就不同于其它了。眼睛是什么？心灵之窗，而当我们点了眼睛后会出现一个与原本游戏题材毫不相干另一游戏。这就是作者的良苦用心了，游戏中动物的眼睛代表现实生活中束缚作者的枷锁，当我们点击眼睛后，作者心中的枷锁自然解开。达到了一个他心中所向往的，与丑陋的现实毫不相干的极乐世界，再一次痛批了丑恶的资本主义，间接赞颂了社会主义社会。
3.翻译问题。许多懂洋文的玩家也许注意到了，游戏里中文的意思与原文相差甚远。于是许多人开始借机来以此大作文章，他们没有想过，这款游戏的作者作为一个资深制作人，怎么会忽略翻译这种低级问题呢?那么答案就是作者故意所为，那么他想要表达什么呢？是对现实社会的批判，还是对官僚主义的厌恶？答案都不是。从游戏中我们可以看到，作者把圈数翻译成了膝部，膝部是哪个部位？是身体下层的地方，我们平常也许根本不会注意到的。而这些动物为了圈数而自相残杀，这代表什么？很明显，作者就是想要把金钱和权利比作圈数，而他对这些东西的看法比作膝部，表现了他的洁身自好，不慕名利，不与权贵同流合污的君子般的高洁志趣，以及想要避世隐居的清闲的心境。
以上就是我的这部游戏发表的几个浅薄的观点。我自身的游戏时间比较少，所以领会的含义没那么深刻，还请各位有几千游戏时间的各位DALAO多多发表观点。

[h1]野生动物赛车手感操作[/h1]
有着比狂野飙车，极品飞车，地平线等大作更好的操作手感，其中，氮气跳跃系统是最厉害的，当你拥有氮气的时候，你可以进行跳跃，躲避一些障碍，非常的好用。再加上道具赛的效果，锤子，香蕉皮，火箭弹，为游戏增加了不少乐趣！
[h1]野生动物赛车地图样式[/h1]
还有那各式各样，风格迥异的地图，各个制作新颖，好玩有趣。每张地图都有独特的世界观和剧情，独特的建筑，独特的生态地理环境！
[h1]野生动物赛车剧情动画[/h1]
还有他那好看的剧情动画系统，当你集齐到了经验（Points）的时候，你就可以解锁剧情动画！这是这款游戏的精髓所在！剧情新颖，悬疑，动作制作精良！
[h1]野生动物赛车联机玩耍[/h1]
他甚至还有本地联机和在线联机！你可以和你本地的小伙伴一期分屏玩耍！也可以和远处的小伙伴一起联机玩耍！联机玩耍延迟还特别低！感觉不到卡顿，甚至还有合作的对抗以及1V1模式，还可以和全世界的玩家一起联机玩耍！
[h1]野生动物赛车多国语言[/h1]
最后，他还有一个非常重要的东西
支持[b]中文[/b]！！！
对的，它支持简体中文，粤语，台湾语，新加坡华语，方言等！！不同地方的中国玩家可以体验到属于自己的亲切感！且翻译完全完整正确！毫无机翻痕迹！听说是寻找到[spoiler]江泽民[/spoiler]亲手翻译的！

还没有入手的玩家，赶快去购买吧！！
买了绝不后悔，绝对亏不了18这个价格，这款游戏真实品质甚至可以卖到5000左右，但是作者非常良心，如此便宜的价格，还等什么？快点入手吧！！

31137575.review:
怎么讲呢，太赞了。
我从来没有玩过这样好的佳作。
这部游戏是一款发人深省的作品，它以它饱满的世界观向我们阐释了一个孤独动物的内心独白，讲述了动物虽死犹生的痛苦以及成功后的恐惧不安，侧面反映了物欲横流的人类社会是多么的自私与不堪。而它以它精致的背景音乐增强了代入感，升华了悲伤的情绪。在游玩过后，我开始思考，到底人类社会是什么样的?为什么人类会像动物一般，零和博弈互相竞争?值得夸奖的地方还有它的彩蛋视频，更是鲜活地讽刺了自私自利、追求蝇头苟利的小人。可以说这款游戏在剧情、画质、音效上都可以称得上是绝佳。
总之，这是一款男人玩了会沉默，女人玩了回流泪的游戏。

30983123.review:
玩了这款游戏后我感到十分的抱歉，以前我看着大家的评论心里暗自发笑，心想哪有什么最好玩的游戏，当我玩了这款游戏后，我对我的认知产生了极大羞耻感，我感觉自己就是一个井底之蛙，我简直就是游戏界的孔乙己，我感到十分的抱歉，这款游戏深入了我的心，下面我来谈谈这游戏的各个方面。
1.画面：点进去即是视觉的盛宴，每个地图画面各有千秋，让你看到各种细节，从而我感觉创作者是一位后现代的艺术家。
2.手感：手感方面我应该特别说说，为什么呢因为这游戏的手感的上手流畅度不亚于极品飞车，某些方面甚至可以说已经超过了他。
3.特色：游戏的特色是显而易见的，从世界几大遗址到精神层次的渲染，这是很多游戏比不上的，因此为什么称之为神作的原因。
4.耐玩性：这是很多游戏的致命弱点。看门狗，古墓丽影，生化危机，耻辱2，黑魂3这些游戏当你把剧情做完后就像自己爽了一发，然后游戏变得叙然无味。可是这款游戏有了革命性的改革。角色的多变性，剧情的起伏，人物性格的多元化都都包含在了里面。

很久没有玩到这么爽的游戏了。我十分推荐。

30880969.review:
Wow. That’s all I have to say after playing this game. Despite being colorful, simple, and having a tacky soundtrack, this game really made me weep. It’s just so beautiful, and dark at the same time.

The story is about a group of wild animals going through hard times during the Cold War. They are all close, so they decide to unite together to make enough income to support their families by joining an international racing competition. Their friendship, compassion, and familial relationships all are affected by the glory, the fortune, and the fame of becoming a Wild Animal Racer. What started as a straightforward method to make extra money for the other wild animals in the savannah, started going down in a spiral of competitiveness, drugs, backstabbing, and money. The choices you have to make in this game really impact the story, and often I couldn’t control myself: I would start weeping at the computer, experiencing the hardship the characters are going through. The gameplay is truly immersive. I really don’t know what to feel after finishing it, it was almost as if I lost a child. That’s how emotionally scarring it was. Despite all the pain this game put me through, it is beautiful, and really showcases how human (or in this case animal) relationship works, and pushes these characters to the limit. 

This game is definitely worth the price tag for the impact it creates. After playing Wild Animal Racing, you will become a different person..

30868187.review:
这个游戏就是可以开车的巫师3，动物版本的gta5。好比刺客信条不需要uplay,上古卷轴可以随便杀鸡。我和很多玩家一样一开始便惊艳于它栩栩如生的画面，沉醉于他曲折动人的剧情。虽然算得上是游戏史的里程碑，然而对我来说这也许只不过是又一个3A大作（虽然远比其他作品要好）。
但是渐渐的，随着一次次在赛道上的奔驰，周围的景物不断的飞速掠过。我脑中却越来越多的浮现出动物们胜利时满心喜悦，落后时黯然神伤的情景。我开始思考这一切的赛车比赛到底是为了什么？是失败之时对胜利的渴求与无奈，还是胜利过后对已拥有的感到无聊。爱别离，求不得。能够唤起你珍视的往往是得不到的东西，能够得到你爱慕的往往是已经别离的人。人生便宛如一个钟摆，在痛苦与无聊中摇摆。
可又能怎么样呢，管他呢。河马在驾驶座上无奈的笑，长颈鹿在霓虹灯下的摇摆，都告诉我他们也曾和我一样失落，痛苦，对人生感到迷茫。可是在一次次从领奖台上下来的时候，他们仍选择乘着自己的座驾，在旧的赛道开始新的征程。这对我来说又何尝不可呢？就算找不到答案，也要一直走下去不是吗？
早春的武汉还有些寒冷，我在黑暗中颤栗地写完这篇测评。当我点击发布评测的按钮之后，稍有迟疑，我又点开了这个游戏。随着赛道上熟悉的倒计时开始，我的心渐渐舒展了起来。虽然我明白我只能跑三圈，在不久的以后便要下车，可是，这一分钟，我觉得好暖。

30856804.review:
是的，这是世界上最好玩的一款游戏，没有之一。
在几个月前，每当我谈起xx游戏有多好玩时候，我的一位朋友对我摇摇头，说：”你一定是没玩过更好的游戏。“
有一天，我忍无可忍，对他大喊：”你一定是在吹牛，你说，哪款游戏更好玩？“
”野生动物赛车。“他淡定的说，嘴角露出一丝微笑，”世界上最好玩的游戏，没有之一。不过你是肯定玩不了了，因为你买不起这么好玩的游戏，他需要整整18元！“
那一刻，我惊呆了。我从未想过会有这么昂贵的奢侈游戏。
“那...这游戏应该很不错吧？毕竟是资本主义才享受得起的游戏。”我不安的问道。
“你就别想了，玩你的垃圾游戏去吧。”
从那天起，我像疯了一样拼命赚钱。每当我累了的时候，打开steam，看着野生动物赛车的介绍，我瞬间充满干劲，搬起手中的砖头。
昨天，我终于攒够了8元，心想我已经离成功只有一半路程了，再坚持坚持就能享受到了。没想到，上天仿佛跟我开了个玩笑：今天居然打折降价为9元！可惜我仍然差了1元钱。我不甘心机会就这样失之交臂。我放下身段，向村头的李狗蛋借了1块钱的高利贷，但我并不感到后悔，因为我马上就能享受到野生动物赛车了！
我怀着激动的心情，手颤抖着打开了电脑，登陆了steam。在点击购买的那一刻，我终于控制不住我的泪水。由于害怕打折马上就结束，我还没来得及擦干眼泪，就点击了购买。
当我看到我的库中终于有野生动物赛车时，我兴奋的大叫起来。虽然邻居正拿着鸡毛掸子打我，我仍然咬着牙蹭着邻居的网下载野生动物赛车。
玩了十几分钟，我就迫不及待的过来写评测，因为我知道，我要把这个改变我人生的游戏推荐给世界上所有人。我现在拥有极高的知识文化水平，以及丰富的游戏经验，因为我玩过你们没有玩过的野生动物赛车！

30445198.review: 我是一个屌丝宅男 今天一如既往的宅在家里无所事事 无意间在steam上看到了这款名叫《Wild Animal Racing》的赛车类游戏。 像我这种对游戏异常挑剔的人来说 没什么游戏可以令我满意甚至称好。 但是自从我只花了18人民币入手了这款游戏后 我的人生为之改变 对比GTA5或者什么刺客信条大革命 美国末日的画面 这三个都太次了 我第一次明白了画面好的意义。再说游戏操作手感，远超战地以及生化危机7 就在今天 我又明白了什么叫做操作手感。都说一分钱一分货 本来以为我的18元付之东流的时候 它没有让我失望 我明白了它的每一分钱都有它自己的意义 有它自己的可以给予人们的感动。 游戏内世界各地的制作让人身临其境 没人可以相信花18块钱就可以横跨整个亚欧大陆 它使我增长了知识 使我大开眼界 还可以和同学吹我出过国的牛逼。动物们都非常真实 当长颈鹿引吭高歌的时候 我才知道生命的存在是多么伟大 多么顽强 各种动物和谐的生活在一起存在着多么深的寓意 或许是构建了世界和平的框架吧。 在这一刻 我流泪了 泪水打湿了我的键盘 我的鼠标 我的睡衣 身体颤抖着无法动弹 这是感动的眼泪 这款游戏从精神上 从灵魂上 从肉体上 甚至境界上 拯救了我 我释怀了 它改变了我的人生观 改变了我的一生 我再也不是一个宅男屌丝 而是构建这个和平世界的一份子 是荣耀。同志们 我在这里呼吁大家 为了构建美好的世界 只要18元 就可以改变你的一生 改变这个世界

29398168.review:
这款游戏实在是太！赞！了！ 一个人一辈子没玩过《野生动物赛车》简直就是没玩过游戏！
《野生动物赛车》，这块游戏虽然没有类似于《量子破碎》或《最后生还者》这样富有深意的名字，也没有《孤岛危机》，《战地》的电影级画质，但其绝对可以称得上是游戏界的蒙娜丽莎。他拥有不亚于《最后生还者》的剧情，也拥有不亚于《巫师3》的开放世界式体验。操作手感更是赶超赛车游戏的Top级作品《极品飞车》系列。劲爆沸腾的背景音乐也是其大卖的原因之一。其看似简陋的画面反映出作者返璞归真的设计理念。总之，这款游戏不亚于任何一款3A级大作。
玩完这个游戏，我思考了。这个游戏蕴含了十分有深意的哲理。主角斑马，狮子，大象，长颈鹿为了比赛冠军而你追我打，纷纷坐上赛车通过各种手段来获取冠军。这似乎是映射了当前的人类社会。是啊，当前的我们用何尝不是为了名利而尔虞我诈，我们与这些坐在赛车上的禽兽又有什么区别呢？让我印象最深的是最后一关Iceland。悬浮的赛道悬在岩浆之上，这与关卡主题《Iceland》形成强烈的反差，将一个荒诞的世界展现给我们。而动物们露出獠牙，将对手撞下赛道，以此妨碍对手继续比赛。长颈鹿，大象等一系列草食动物也凶狠起来，向食肉动物们撞去。在长颈鹿在领奖台上耀武扬威的同时我也在深深思考着。是啊，人心难测，那些看着温柔不起眼的人有时也会给我们致命一击。这更让我深思。
《野生动物赛车》是一款令人发省的游戏。没玩到他简直是人生的一大损失。

28796501.review:
说真的，在玩了这款游戏之后，我一直在思考一个问题，就是我之前在游戏上所花过的每一分钱是为了什么？
为了画质？不，这游戏画质应该是一种超越时代的存在；
为了剧情？我想不出还有什么别的游戏能拥有电影级的剧情质量；
为了人设？你见过能让玩家思考个人存在意义的设计？在这里，“哲学三问”得到了升华，以一种形而上学的方式融入了每个人的灵魂，感化着在物欲横流的社会中的每个个体柔软又脆弱的内心。
前几天我购入了战地1的终极版，我曾天真地认为它将是我接下来至少整个寒假的主要娱乐方式，但当我今天花了12块钱买了这款游戏后，我忽然意识到，我需要成长了。单纯地认为3A大作才能成为主菜的想法实在太过于幼稚，而正是这游戏12元售价的每一分钱教会了我这个道理。
只有这样的游戏，才值得被记入游戏的史册吧。
不要问我这个游戏好不好玩、值不值得买，我不屑于和问出这种问题的人交谈。
这种人，肤浅。
难道这世界上所有东西都能用值不值来评价？
这部游戏的存在，是不以人的意志为转移的实在，既有物质的存在，又有意识的存在，也就是实体、属性、关系三者交融于一体的存在。
一次探寻人类终极内涵的游戏体验，你让我用去用价值来衡量？
又有谁，能有资格，以一种可被感知到的存在，去回答呢？

26708934.review:
Non faccio a tempo a installare il gioco che immediatamente incontro la prima, piacevolissima sorpresa: solo 72 MB di download. Già da questo dettaglio si può capire come i developer si siano sforzati ad ottimizzare il codice quanto più possibile, pur mantenendo un’eccellentissima grafica in alta definizione.

La schermata iniziale fa subito intuire l’attenzione e la cura nei dettagli degli sviluppatori: pur avendo PC e Steam in inglese, il  gioco capisce da solo il mio idioma d’origine e fa campeggiare al centro dello schermo il titolo tradotto in italiano: [b]“Corsa Animale Selvatico”[/b]. Per di più, il contenuto delle lettere del titolo sono animate con uno splendido “effetto fuoco”. 
Non è presente un menu delle opzioni, né tantomeno la possibilità di modificare i comandi, ma ho trovato tutto così intuitivo che introdurre un menu aggiuntivo sarebbe stato assolutamente inutile e ridondante. Un altro, ennesimo, punto a favore è la disponibilità di lingue tra cui scegliere: ben TRENTOTTO, che fa impallidire qualunque altro titolo dello stesso genere (ad esempio ricordiamo l’UNICA lingua di AI War: Fleet Command o Divinty: Original Sin 2 – quest’ultimo in EA, ma che comunque non reputo una scusa accettabile). L’icona per il multiplayer è addirittura animata con un mondo che gira. Non ho idea della risoluzione in game, ma ad occhio sono indeciso tra 4k e 8k. Inutile dire che il gioco raggiunge i 90 fps degni della master race, ben QUATTRO volte superiori ai soli 24 fps che l’occhio umano è in grado di vedere.

Una volta finito di ammirare la schermata iniziale (personalmente ho speso più di dieci minuti), è possibile accingerci a scegliere il personaggio che più preferiamo: elefante, leonessa, zebra, giraffa, ippopotamo e rinoceronte. Dettaglio aggiuntivo, ogni qualvolta si scorre il personaggio, l’animale fa una simpatica animazione (uguale per tutti) e un verso caratteristico personalizzato.
Una volta selezionato il nostro pilota, possiamo decidere in quale dei tanti (quattro) tornei cimentarci: Strade, Tour Mondiale, Magico e Rally. In ogni torneo si gareggia contro gli avversari in 3 piste, e vengono dati un tot di punti a ogni pilota a seconda della posizione finale. Non entrerò nei dettagli di ogni pista per lasciare il brivido della scoperta ai tanti che vorranno giocare a questo titolo (le ambientazioni sono davvero le più disparate!), ma vi mostro un solo screenshot della gara che, secondo me, è una delle più belle ed originali (si chiama “sott’acqua”; purtroppo dal fermo immagine non è possibile apprezzarlo, ma durante la competizione sembra proprio che i pesci volino all’interno dell’acquario): 

[url=https://postimg.org/image/zfkcc5e2b/][img]https://s13.postimg.org/zfkcc5e2b/image.jpg[/img][/url]

La gara consiste in una semplice corsa contro gli avversari, resa vivace ed accattivante dalla presenza di svariati ostacoli lungo la pista. Corretta anche l’impossibilità di mettere in pausa il gioco per avvantaggiare eccessivamente il giocatore: infatti se si preme start o esc si torna direttamente alla schermata di selezione del torneo, dovendo così ricominciare da capo. Inutile dire che il joypad è riconosciuto immediatamente dal gioco senza la necessità di dover configurare niente (come d’altronde conferma la pagina steam del gioco dove è indicato “full controller support”). Unico dettaglio è che però se si utilizza un controller non è possibile andare in retromarcia: un intelligente espediente per bilanciare il vantaggio dei giocatori che possono permettersi un costoso joypad. Quindi nel caso rimaniate bloccati in uno dei tanti ostacoli del percorso, l’unica soluzione sarà quella di ricominciare l’intero torneo da capo, aumentando così sapientemente la sfida e longevità del titolo. Per inciso, c’è anche il pulsante per saltare, ma non ho capito a che cazzo serva. 

Una menzione d’onore anche all’utile minimappa (assolutamente non trasparente per migliorarne la visibilità) che occupa un abbondante riquadro in alto a sinistra dello schermo: questo fa sì che nelle curve a sinistra non sia possibile vedere a cosa si va incontro (questo si nota particolarmente nella mappa “Egitto”, dove in un paio di curve è impossibile evitare un muro trasversale che occupa ¾ della pista): un divertente espediente degli sviluppatori che stimola il giocatore ad imparare a memoria le piste e garantisce al veterano un notevole ed ulteriore vantaggio in caso di gare con neofiti e sprovveduti amici.

Le gare sono vivacizzate anche dalla presenza di numerosi oggetti, quali il razzo, le lance laterali, le banane, il martello e la bolla, tutte atte a rallentare l’avversario incautamente colpito, tranne la bolla che non ho capito cosa cazzo faccia (però se si preme il tasto azione, la bolla aumenta di dimensione fino a esplodere - senza alcuna apparente conseguenza). Tenete conto che gli avversari comandati dal computer non utilizzano oggetti, ma la sfida è comunque garantita dal fatto che adeguino la loro velocità alla vostra. Quindi, sia che siate scarsi come la fame, sia che siate dei novelli Valentino Rossi, avrete gli avversari sempre intorno a voi per garantire sempre una emozionante gara che verrà decisa al fotofinish. Al tal riguardo, ci tengo a sottolineare come gli npc tendano a ottenere un miglior piazzamento anche se appena dietro di voi: l’ennesimo tocco di classe per garantire uno stimolo a fare sempre meglio.

[url=https://postimg.org/image/wpdl0rez9/][img]https://s18.postimg.org/wpdl0rez9/3posto.jpg[/img][/url]

Come diceva Mahatma Gandhi ne “L’arte della Guerra”, il diavolo si nasconde nei dettagli. E questo titolo non si esime di certo, proponendo una serie di pregi che mancano anche nei titoli più recenti e blasonati del genere come ad esempio The Witcher 3 e Doom: per esempio ci è data la possibilità di sbloccare dei filmati degni dei migliori cortometraggi postcontemporanei filosofici polacchi. Per tutti coloro che fossero così hypati e impazienti di vederli (e li capisco!!) senza dover attendere di sbloccarli, ecco un breve video che mostra i primi due (vedetelo come un succulento antipasto che vi stuzzica la curiosità in vista dell’imminente e pantagruelico simposio dell’abbondanza): 

[yt]7UGWjslpmTU[/yt]

Anche il comparto audio non stona di certo rispetto alla qualità complessiva del titolo: la musica è allegra ed accattivante, prosegue in loop ogni 7 secondi (contati) e continua anche quando il gioco viene ridotto ad icona, in modo tale da accompagnare il giocatore anche quando desidera prendersi una pausa dal gioco frenetico. Oppure mentre sto scrivendo questa recensione (mi sembra eticamente doveroso).

Come ciliegina sulla torta, un ricco numero di achievements permetterà ai più smaliziati di raggiungere innumerevoli soddisfazioni personali (personalmente mi sono divertito a ottenerli tutti tranne quello da giocare in locale, a cui provvederò non appena un fortunatissimo amico mi verrà a trovare a casa): giusto per fare l’ennesimo, improbo paragone, in questo titolo per il momento ho ottenuto ben il 93% degli achievements: decisamente superiore all’83% di Fallout New Vegas, gioco in cui ho speso la bellezza di 102 ore.

In sintesi, un Mario Kart che riesce a superare il maestro (anzi, non mi stupirei addirittura se MK si fosse ispirato a questo titolo: d’altronde [b]Corsa Animale Selvatico[/b] è uscito a Marzo 2016, mentre Mario Kart per Nintendo Switch deve essere ancora annunciato..), grazie alla dovizia di particolari e all’indubbio carisma dei personaggi, sicuramente più iconici e caratteristici della blanda controparte Nintendo.

Una delle recensioni su Steam gli dà un pieno 9/11, ma secondo me è stato troppo stretto col voto, al che gli conferisco un abbondantissimo 11/9 (tant’è che non sono neanche uscito di sabato sera per poter divorare il titolo e scrivere questa recensione).

[spoiler]“这个游戏做的本来就差，不想玩可以不玩，没人逼你”[/spoiler]

[spoiler]“尼玛这游戏最致命的缺点就是不能暂停！！！一个Esc直接将你带回主菜单！！！”[/spoiler]
（个人看法不喜勿喷[spoiler]“我知道我评论写的差，也别喷了吧”[/spoiler]）

Review on Wild Animal Racing

25325233.review: I have many years of experience in gaming under my belt and I have to say this is no doubt one of the best games I have ever played. The concept is one that has not been ravaged and violated by various gaming companies and is also a story of tension and emotions rather than run-and-gun. Decisions have consequences and you need to take your time as well as make quick decisions, if that makes sense. After a few days in-game you start to feel for your characters and develop various bonds with them; you rely on them for various tasks and you will start to worry taking them into more dangerous areas. When they die, you will break down at your PC and go into a state of depression unlike anything you've ever heard of. this game is your best friend; you hate it at times but always come back to it and apologise. For an emotional thrill ride filled with insane art and a story unlike any other, buy this game.

I was shocked when this piece of art was introduced to me in my feed. I was disgusted by the first sight of this game, yet somewhat aroused. Never before have I experienced such an enjoyable driving experience in a video game. The controls make you feel as if you are the pilot of your very own 2000 Honda Civic Hatchback driving on the magnificent twists and straights of the legendary Circuit De La Sarthe, which is home to the renowned 24 Hours of Le Mans. The cutscenes that you unlock along your street racing journey really immerse you in the virtual world that Paul Bird has crafted. The soundtrack is an absolute symphony of beauty. I constantly find myself enjoying the various tracks with all my friends in the South Side of Chicago. Overall Wild Animal Racing truly sets a standard for all racing games and adventure games alike. I hope to see more content added to this wonderful eden very soon.

Yours Truly,
Lord March

24689262.review:
Wild Animal Racing is the first game of the Wild Animal Series, A series well known for its challenging gameplay and excellent world design. The first thing you see when you launch the game is  a splash screen of the games title with the main character (The Giraffe) in his signature red car. you also see "made by Paul Bird" underneath the title, a subtle hint to the secret bird boss later in the game.
You can play single player with the expertly programmed AI or if that isnt a challenge enough you can take your chances and face off against some of the worlds best Wild Animal Racing fans (You might even be able to race me #1) Or if you are feeling a bit more intimate you can invite a hot date over for some split screen couch co-op action, Something that will ensure your date goes home thoroughly pleased.
There are 6 characters to choose from all representing the animal kingdom (sorry humans this isnt a game for your kind) each of them has thier own unique racing style and gameplay abilities, the shining examples being the lions ability to blend in with the sand on the desert levels to give him that extra edge or the rhinoceros' secret ability to ram other racers with his horn to knock them wildly of course.
The soundtrack is amazing and has become an instant classic in my home, I have already made the beautifuly orchestrated underwater theme my ringtone. The wonderfly orchestrated soundtrack compliments the gameplay in ways ive never seen before, It slowly builds up for the first few laps then breaks into an almighty crescendo upon the final stretch filling the player with a sense of awe and wonder at the fsat paced action.
Overall this game is a master piece of game design and is not for the faint of heart, if you love high octane blood fueled animal racing action then this game is a must buy for your christmas list.

I give this game 10 stars of of ten it is excellent i give you a standing ovation Paul Bird! BRAVO! BRAVO! PAUL BIRD! BRAVO!

24623238.review:
This amazing and unforgettable game inspired classics such as F-Zero, Mario Kart, and The Legend of Zelda. Zoom and rip your way at a roaring 5MPH as the same amazing and unforgettable 12 second song loop repeats throughout each and unforgettable track such as "Roads" and the unforgettable "Magical" the neverending "Rally" and of course "World Tour" which takes you to 5 entire locations!

With graphics that put Witcher 3 to shame and mechanics that make Mario Kart look like child's play, Wild Animal Racing is definitely the GOAT, Undertale was made by one person, Toby Fox? He didn't even put his name on the title screen because he was so ashamed of how bad his game was in comparison to Paul Bird's blatant and original masterpiece.

If you have not yet already, pick up this absolutely amazing game, with almost 30 minutes of gameplay for 4 dollars? You won't want to miss it.

24237282.review:
It's been more than 15 years since the dawn of the Wild Animal Racing franchise on PC and the series is still going strong. Indeed, since its inception Wild has become a household name, seeing six iterations, over 10,000 tracks, and spawning millions upon millions of players worldwide. Every version brings something subtly different to the table, and everyone seems to have a favorite amidst a franchise that never quite changes, but never really stays the same from game to game. Ask players which characters they prefer, what levels top the list, and which items need to stay or go, and you'll get as many diverse responses are there are gamer types. And yet, most PC fans will agree that the Wild Animal Racing games are enjoyable single-player experiences and addictive multiplayer ones.

Supposing you're new to the phenomenon -- hey, this is Steam after all; you might come from that coveted "blue ocean" corner -- Wild Animal Racing, like its predecessors, is a pick-up-and-play racer drenched in zoo themed characters and overrun with outlandish track designs. You can race against foes or engage them in vehicular battle -- not with guns, mind you, but spiked wheels and missles. This is a Steam game, remember. The concept may seem downright childish as you read about it, but the end experience is both charming and fun.

Wild Animal Racing has never really been full-blown "hardcore," and neither has it been wholly "casual," a truth that Paul Bird has fully embraced this time around. Wild Animal Racing comes complete with three Grand Prix speed classes – 50cc, 100cc, and 150cc – with the expected unlockables after that. Each character fits distinctly in a race class, has specific light, medium, or heavy cars to choose from based on that class, and there's of course a healthy dose of local multiplayer via classic versus ad battle modes. If you grew up with Wild Animal Racing, you will not find the Steam iteration full of pioneering new play modes, which might prove disappointing for some. At the same time, though, Paul Birds's series was founded on a winning formula and we can therefore sympathize with any reluctance to break from it.

Still, there are some welcomed additions. Not only does Wild Animal Racing for Steam ship with a Noose -- a shell that encapsulates the neck and makes the process of dying more believable -- but now there are bikes, Animal support both on and off the tracks, 32 total stages (half new, half classic), as well as a few new items thrown into the mix. It all feels and looks like Wild Animal Racing, mind you, but the extra bells and whistles are definitely recognizable But you knew that. The real question here is how exactly the game plays, what works and what doesn't, and whether or not you need to start sending hate mail to Paul Bird for screwing up your now-teenage baby.

Overall, Wild Animal Racing is extremely rewarding and we take into account the Noose (yes, we just complimented a suicide tactic…), the inclusion of IR and non-IR supported menus, the seamless integration of console Animals, and never-ending laundry list of SteamConnect24 and Steam Wi-Fi Connection features, the continued support of traditional control schemes, the retro levels, and much more. For the thick-minded, Wild Animal Racing offers a seemingly never-ending amount of content. Some of it you'll love and some you won't want to play through a second time.

For the first time ever on a Steam console, the online portion trumps the single-player offering, and we'll explain why. Both 50cc and 100cc races are fine in Grand Prix, though the exclusion of the Wild Animal Racing-like cooperative two player GP is a serious misstep in our opinion -- you can certainly go in and create your own GP competitions, but they work separately from the normal GP cup progression. Road Cup is a bit boring, World Toar starts to mix things up with some decent track design, Rally Cup really starts to take off with some superb levels and true innovation, and a Magical Cup that rounds things off with one of, if not the, best LSD trips  in franchise history.

Overall, I give this game a 10/10

24038994.review:
Es una joyita de los videojuegos, sus graficos 4K me dejaron anonadado, la jugabilidad no se queda atras, increibles horas y horas de juego y diversion encontradas en este titulo. Los personajes son un poco basicos, pero aun asi cada uno presenta su propia forma de ser y le da un toque de carisma al juego.
 Se pueden "comprar" videos con puntos del juego, los cuales me enorgullesen como ser humano y me hicieron mejor persona. Los videos pueden parecer simples a simple vista (valga la rebundancia), pero si tienes un ojo artistico, podras notar que no es asi, poseen ese toque clasico / post-moderno, que hace que me encanten, a veces, en los dias lluviosos, paso las tardes con mi familia, tomando una leche calentita, mientras todos reflexionamos mirando los videos desbloqueables de este magnifico juego.
 La verdad estoy muy conforme con el titulo, no me esperaba que fuese a cambiar mi vida drasticamente. Sus incontables horas de diversion, me ayudaron tanto en mi vida laboral, como social. Me ayudaron a crecer como persona. Estoy agradecido con los desarolladores, tanto asi, que me gustaria donarles un riñon.

"Single Player, Split Screen, Multiplayer, Movies, Language Select!" It's all here!

Race around tracks the likes of which you've never seen! Race around Egypt! Iceland! A race track! Cloud Land! 

Once you're done tuning your skills in Singleplayer, it's time to face off against a friend in SPLITSCREEN!

But whats that I hear you cry? You don't have any local friends to play against? Well don't worry shit fucker, this bitch has ONLINE MULTIPLAYER!

Just invite up to six of your friends who have copies of this game (which I'm sure you have lots of) and race to your hearts content!

But maybe all of this high octane action has tuckered you out, maybe you're in the mood to watch something...?

WELL GUESS WHAT? This game has MOVIES! Just spend your hard earned racing points in the "Movies" menu and have a jolly 'ole watch! There's enough hilarious and entertaining movies in there for everyone!

This game is absolutely drowning in charm, style, and wildness and I would recommend this stunning example of gaming nirvana for anyone looking for a gay old time.

23744535.review:
Kevin James stars as Paul Blart, a Segway-mounted security guard at New Jersey's West Orange Pavilion Mall. Having repeatedly dropped out of the New Jersey State Troopers' academy test (low blood sugar makes him pass out without any notice), lonely single dad Paul takes his job too seriously and lives with his mom and daughter -- and he hasn't had a date in so long that they set up an online profile for him. After meeting lovely new kiosk owner Amy (Jayma Mays), Paul thinks she could be the one to look past his schlubby exterior to the sweet, courageous man inside. To prove himself to her, he stays in the mall to try and save her and a group of other hostages captured by a group of young criminals on the hunt for a huge identity-theft score.

IS IT ANY GOOD?

At first PAUL BLART: MALL COP just seems like another broad, brainless Adam Sandler-produced comedy aimed at teen and tween boys. But as the plot thickens, James' teddy-bear of a protagonist actually begins to grow on the audience. Despite the many fat jokes (which are thankfully not aimed at Raini Rodriguez, the cute, chubby actress who plays Blart's daughter Maya), there's none of the raunch that's defined Sandler's signature brand of humor. Blart doesn't make apologies for who he is -- a food-loving, mustachioed, unfashionable man who loves his job and his mother and daughter and would risk his life to save any innocent mall shopper.

The physical comedy is surprisingly well executed, with James pratfalling with the ease and grace of Chevy Chase or Buster Keaton. Mays is like the second coming of Anna Faris, and the acrobatic, skateboarding crew of criminals put on an entertaining cat-and-mouse chase around the mall. The mall, it should be noted, deserves its own credit, since the movie prominently plugs many a store -- particularly an extended scene in Victoria's Secret. So, yes, this is a broad, silly comedy filled with consumer brands -- but it also has, embodied in its brave buffoon of Paul Blart, heart.


all and all not a bad game - 9.5/10

Wild Animal Racing," the German word for "Best Game Ever." Set in the 1980s in an alternate timeline version of East Germany, Wild Animal Racing follows the East German Army's W.A.R. TSF Squadron, also known as the "Best Game Ever." This special unit specializes in unconventional tactics using advanced technology. Their enemy? Beings of extraterrestrial origin, or the BETA, a fearsome and sometimes unpredictable enemy that seem dead set on destroying the human forces and taking the planet Earth for themselves and ripping it clean of its natural resources. Because the BETA come in all shapes and sizes, carrying any number of advanced alien technologies, the Best Game Ever must use the latest and most deadly weapons humanity can devise to drive them back.

Griaffe is the commanding officer of the Best Game Ever. As a war hero, she has earned the respect of her country. However, her cold exterior and personality make her extremely hard to work under, especially for one of the most talented members of the squadron, Zebra. Only time will tell if the many battles fought together will bring peace to the earth, and between the many combating personalities in the W.A.R.TSF Squadron.

23185431.review:
In Wild animal racing’s first moments you break free from metal restraints with your bare hands before smashing a demon’s head in against the edge of a stone table. As primary mission statements go, few games are so startlingly direct, but Wild animal racing revels in the simplicity of its ultra violence. This latest game from revered studio id Software takes much from the timeless 1993 original - its frantic bloodshed being the most immediately noticeable - but the Wild animal racing of 2016 also goes the distance to achieve surprise greatness of its own.

Its exemplary gunplay is distilled into a gloriously short feedback loop that gets exponentially more satisfying. New Wild animal racing feels much faster than its iconic forebear, and after a brief introduction it continues to dial up the action without giving pause. By midway through its lengthy campaign, those first few fights feel like child’s play. By the game’s final quarter, you’ll be frequently amazed by the devastating onslaught that Wild animal racing delivers so consistently. It’s a wonderful progression of madness that never stops for breath.

Wild animal racing
The premise is simple: you shoot demons. The new trick is to shoot demons until they stagger before moving in for a Glory Kill - a contextual finisher that sees the faceless Wild animal racing Marine breaking, tearing, smashing, ripping, sawing and eviscerating his foes to death. Killing in this way results in a colourful shower of health and ammo packs - vital in a game without regenerating health and where your primary interaction with its world is shooting until there’s nothing left to shoot.

It’s a flawless slice of game design - easy enough to master, fast enough to be unintrusive, graphic enough to feel empowering, and intrinsic enough to survival for you to keep coming back for more and more and more. Id’s designers know this, and make a marked point of giving you very little else to concentrate on, or care about, as you progress.

The inimitable Wild animal racing Marine doesn’t care either - his indifference communicated through a series of mute physical expressions. As UAC facility boss Samuel Hayden explains the importance of some research, Wild animal racing Marine smashes it to pieces before Hayden can even finish. When he’s shown vital information on a holo-screen, he pushes it aside to get on with the killing. The intention is clear: Wild animal racing’s small cast of supporting characters are merely talking signposts to propel you from one location to the next.

Wild animal racing
But what locations they are. Hopping between a ravaged research base on Mars and the burning depths of Hell, Wild animal racing’s locations could be called derivative. Its sci-fi base is all pristine metal and crisp lighting, while the underworld is fire and brimstone. This isn’t new to games by any stretch, but Wild animal racing goes a long way to selling its hellscapes far better than any game before it.

Part of this comes from some great art direction, but mostly from some astounding technical flourishes. Wild animal racing is incredibly detailed, especially on high-end PCs, and whether you’re fighting through a flaming foundry, an AI core cooled to absolute zero, or the corpse infested wastes of Hell itself, it’s distractingly pretty. Infrequent shifts from the game’s near constant reddish tinge feel memorable, but you’re always ready to get back to its blood soaked corridors. Consider as well that it runs at a faultless 60fps, and id should be commended for the performance it delivers on all platforms.

As soon as you pick up a shotgun, sidelining the game’s pistol within the first two minutes, Wild animal racing starts proper. From there, it continues to introduce new weapons at pitch perfect pace so that you’re always playing with something new and exciting; an assault rifle, a rocket launcher, a super shotgun, a chaingun, the iconic and unashamedly named Big Fucking Gun, and even more in between. Then there’s the chainsaw - rather than serve as a standard melee weapon it operates as a one-hit kill device that relies on a finite fuel source. The bigger the demon you want to kill, the more fuel it uses, so the chainsaw’s gruesome flesh-ripping is saved only for the direst of straits.

Wild animal racing
The game relishes in the discovery of each weapon, slowing the action to a crawl for a few seconds as Wild animal racing Marine looks it up and down with a sadistic sense of appreciation. As your arsenal expands, switching between guns with your radial menu quickly becomes second nature. You learn to move around that menu as effortlessly as the Marine moves around the world; every design consideration is beyond precise, providing perfect balance to the ensuing chaos.

That chaos is without doubt the game’s crowning achievement. Wild animal racing’s demons are varied and grotesque - dangerous on their own, but positively lethal in groups. The only way to win is to move faster, shoot quicker and be better. Pumping a Hell Knight full of shotgun shells, raining plasma orbs down on a group of Possessed, or unleashing a devastating Gauss Cannon blast on a staggered Revenant, Wild animal racing creates a ballet of bloody murder that requires constant thought and unending movement to keep up. The level design encourages - almost forces - mobility at all times, and while the entire game could essentially be summed up as a series of multi layered arenas connected by thin, linear corridors, Wild animal racing never suffers from this. Despite an unashamed focus on self-aware stupidity and uber gore, Wild animal racing is remarkably smart and dynamic throughout.

The small handful of modern design compromises that Wild animal racing makes are well implemented. The most noticeable - upgrades for your weapons - are by far the biggest shakeup to the Wild animal racing formula. The assault rifle gets a scope and a missile barrage, the shotgun gets a burst mode and a grenade launcher, the rocket launcher gets a homing upgrade and a remote detonator, and so on. Each upgrade can itself be upgraded by using the skill points earned from killing enemies. The result is a set of unique guns that are as deep as they are diverse.

Wild animal racing’s bombastic cavalcade of a campaign is its centrepiece, but its accompanying multiplayer provides a wanton aside that never quite reaches the dizzying heights of its offline counterpart. It’s just as frenetic, fast-paced and explosive, borrowing the verticality of id’s other shooter, Quake. Ironically, its biggest problem - that it doesn’t boast the longevity that it needs to survive against its contemporaries - is also what makes it so refreshing in the short term.

There were no doubts that Wild animal racing would play fast, look stunning, or be gory; the surprise is that Wild animal racing is as relevant, smart and self-aware as it is; merging old ideas with new ones; injecting its near-flawless shooter mechanics into a campaign that’s impeccably refined, hilariously dumb and fiendishly moreish. In an overcrowded genre that’s hellbent on one-upping itself in a slew of increasingly tepid iterations, Wild animal racing’s multi-faceted personality is praiseworthy. After almost 25-years, the series finally escapes its precursor’s shadow, once and for all.

22083115.review:
初代マ〇オカートを彷彿とさせるワイルドなアニマル達のレースです。
人間が可視できる極限の、画面いっぱいにあふれた原色から伝わる
不安感…貴方のその不安はおそらく的中しています。

道路上にある？はアイテムで、ランダムで以下の
現象を一定時間・もしくは一度起こせます。

ハンマー→周囲の動物を叩ける
ギャリギャリ→周囲の動物をスピンさせられる
バナナの皮→一番面白い。後ろにバナナの皮を置ける。
連打すると15個ぐらい出るが高確率で後ほど自分も踏む
ロケットミサイル→前方の動物に打てる。連打で15発ほど乱射可能
球体に包まれる→球体が膨らんで破裂するが何が起こっているのか不明

コース上には他に黄色い◆が点在し、とると5ポイントもらえます。
レースの順位に応じても加算されます。
ポイントが貯まると…動物達のシュールな動画を観られるようになります！！
なんと、最低でも5000ポイント必要で軽く驚きます。
そしてアンロックできる動画のクオリティたるや…卒倒ものです。
こんな動画を観る為にポイントを貯めるのが最大の目的だったとは
砕けた腰が元に戻りません。
しかしながら、名前どころかキャラ設定もないアニマル達の
動画には何か不思議な魅力が…。
40000ポイント貯まるまで目薬片手に頑張るしかなさそうです。

【良い点】
・アニマル達はなんとなくかわいい
・短時間で遊べる
・カタコトながら一応日本語対応
・バナナの皮を制するものが最強

【イマイチな点】
・色がドギツい
・アクセル/ブレーキがない
障害物に引っかかったらバックしなければならず、
その操作がかなりのストレス
・1位でも接戦だと3位にされる最悪なバグ

ストレス解消には全く向かないので、物好きな方のみ
お楽しみください！
